Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Direct phone line, Complimentary internet access.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: located on the beach of Parga, with direct access to the city in various ways. It’s only an hour away from the airport of Aktion, 45 minutes from the city of Preveza, 48 kilometers from the international port of Igoumenitsa and 3 ½ hours from Thessaloniki, via the Egnatia Express Highway.
